text:
The US has 4% of world’s pop, 25% of world’s confirmed #SARSCoV2 infections, & 20% of world’s confirmed #COVID19 deaths. 

Failure to #WearAMask etc ➡️ uncontrolled spread ➡️ risk of new & more harmful #COVIDvariants. We need #vaccine in 🇺🇸 arms ASAP. Sadly we’re a global threat. https://t.co/s6FrxNPebf
